prompts: Create a playful fire-type Pokemon that resembles a mischievous cat with striking yellow eyes.
I want a small, agile Pokemon with a sleek body, perfect for sneaking around in urban settings.
Generate a fire-type creature with a bold personality, featuring vibrant red and black colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a fiery feline, ready to leap into action.
Imagine a cute but fierce little cat Pokemon that loves to play with fire.
Design a Pokemon with a distinctive black coat and fiery red accents that captures attention.
Show me a starter Pokemon that has a unique blend of colors and a fun-loving demeanor.
